title: Revert typography by removing Lovalina font integration and usage

requirements.summary: Remove Lovalina font registration and Tailwind font family configuration so the app no longer depends on Lovalina font files.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/index.css` no longer contains an `@font-face` block for `font-family: 'Lovalina'` or any references to `/assets/fonts/lovalina/...`.
The frontend builds successfully without requiring any Lovalina font files to exist.

file_operations.description: Remove the Lovalina-related `@font-face` declaration and any references/commentary mentioning Lovalina or `/assets/fonts/lovalina` so global styles match the pre-font-change setup.
Remove the `extend.fontFamily.lovalina` entry (and any other Lovalina mentions, if present) so Tailwind no longer generates `font-lovalina` utilities or references the Lovalina family.

requirements.summary: Revert UI typography by removing `font-lovalina` class usage from the header brand and key page titles.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader.tsx` brand title "Daily Nakshatra" no longer uses the `font-lovalina` Tailwind class.
`frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx` hero title no longer uses the `font-lovalina` Tailwind class.
`frontend/src/pages/TomorrowPage.tsx` hero title no longer uses the `font-lovalina` Tailwind class.
`frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx` page title no longer uses the `font-lovalina` Tailwind class.
`frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.tsx` page title no longer uses the `font-lovalina` Tailwind class.

acceptanceCriteria: A repository-wide search finds no remaining occurrences of `font-lovalina`, `Lovalina`, or `/assets/fonts/lovalina` in frontend source/config files.
The app renders with the normal/default font stack (no custom Lovalina typography) and there are no missing-font 404s in the browser network panel.
